EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 4 - Beyond Gigabit (2)
EmailTemplate.subject: Break through the gigabit / low-latency barrier
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Stay ahead with Nokia AirScale Radio Access Build the future-proof network We’ve shown how LTE 4.9G can deliver less than 2 ms latency and more than 4 Gbps throughput. Launch gigabit services almost immediately to boost revenue and win market share. There’s no need to wait for 5G. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
